briefdescription.para: This function returns LIN node implausible error DTC status.

simplesect.para: boolean RetVal: TRUE in case of active DTC, otherwise FALSE.

simplesect.title: Test Method
simplesect.para: This function can be verified in following test: TEST_ErrIsLinNodeImplausibleDTCActive

simplesect.title: Traceability
simplesect.para: This function is given by VW_ICAS1.Chorus.All_Cores.SoftwareDecomposition.ComplexDeviceDrivers.ErrHdl_MQB.SW Architecture.Components It satisfies the following Design Decision Design Decision - Justification. This is a helper function used to provide the LIN Node Implausible DTC active status.

briefdescription.para: This function returns the VLAN global timeout DTC status.

simplesect.para: boolean RetVal: TRUE in case of active DTC, otherwise FALSE.

simplesect.title: Test Method
simplesect.para: This function can be verified in following test: TEST_ErrIsVlanPortGlobalTimeoutDTCActive

simplesect.title: Traceability
simplesect.para: This function is given by VW_ICAS1.Chorus.All_Cores.SoftwareDecomposition.ComplexDeviceDrivers.ErrHdl_MQB.SW Architecture.Components It satisfies the following Design Decision Design Decision - Justification. This is a helper function used to provide Vlan global timeout DTC active status.

briefdescription.para: This function returns bus off/electrical failure DTC status and reset tDiagStartT when DTC change state from active to passive.

simplesect.para: boolean RetVal: TRUE in case of active DTC, otherwise FALSE.

simplesect.title: Test Method
simplesect.para: This function can be verified in following test: TEST_ErrIsBusFaultDTCActive

simplesect.title: Traceability

briefdescription.para: This function returns the global timeout DTC status and reset tDiagStartT when DTC change state from active to passive.

simplesect.para: boolean RetVal: TRUE in case of active DTC, otherwise FALSE.

simplesect.title: Test Method
simplesect.para: This function can be verified in following test: TEST_ErrIsGlobalTimeoutDTCActive

simplesect.title: Traceability

briefdescription.para: This function returns the DID 061a node timeout status.

simplesect.para: boolean RetVal: TRUE in case of active DTC, otherwise FALSE.

simplesect.title: Test Method
simplesect.para: This function can be verified in following test: TEST_ErrIsLinNodeTimeoutDTCActive

simplesect.title: Traceability

briefdescription.para: This function resets (disqualifies) DTC error code for Global Timeout.

parameterdescription.para: TComChannel Channel - Bus with Global Timeout / No Communication failure (see TComChannel).

simplesect.title: Test Method
simplesect.para: This function can be verified in following test: TEST_ErrResetErrorBusGlobalTimeoutDTC

simplesect.title: Traceability
simplesect.para: This function is given by VW_ICAS1.Chorus.All_Cores.SoftwareDecomposition.ComplexDeviceDrivers.ErrHdl_MQB.SW Architecture.Components It satisfies the following Design Decision Design Decision - Justification. This is a helper function used to reset Global TImeout DTC

briefdescription.para: This function is used to get status of testFailed bit of DTC.

parameterdescription.para: TComChannel Channel - Bus with Global Timeout / No Communication failure (see TComChannel).

simplesect.title: Test Method
simplesect.para: This function can be verified in following test: TEST_ErrIsDTCActive

simplesect.para: This function is given by VW_ICAS1.Chorus.All_Cores.SoftwareDecomposition.ComplexDeviceDrivers.ErrHdl_MQB.SW Architecture.Components It satisfies the following Design Decision Design Decision - Justification. This is a helper function used to provide the DTC active status for the given Dem Event

memberdef.argsstring: (const TComChannel Channel, const uint16 NodeID, uint8 *const Index)
memberdef.name: ErrGetNodeTimeoutIdx

briefdescription.para: This function is used to get node index of NodeTimeoutObjArr array.

simplesect.para: E_OK in case of success, otherwise E_NOT_OK.

briefdescription.para: This function reset related node coding DTCs when built in list is rebuild/coding changed.

simplesect.title: Test Method
simplesect.para: This function can be verified in following test: TEST_ErrResetAllBuiltListCodingRelatedDTCs

simplesect.title: Traceability
simplesect.para: This function is given by VW_ICAS1.Chorus.All_Cores.SoftwareDecomposition.ComplexDeviceDrivers.ErrHdl_MQB.SW Architecture.Components It satisfies the following Design Decision Design Decision - Justification. This is a helper function used by the Built Inlist to reset the builtinlist coding related DTC when DID 0x04A3 or 0x0502 is called.

briefdescription.para: This function sets (as qualify) DTC error code for Global Timeout / No Communication error.

parameterdescription.para: [in] Channel - Bus with Global Timeout / No Communication failure (see TComChannel).

briefdescription.para: This function reset all 0x061a coding related DTCs in case of changed coding.

simplesect.title: Test Method
simplesect.para: This function can be verified in following test: TEST_ErrResetAllDK2CodingRelatedDTCs

simplesect.title: Traceability
simplesect.para: This function is given by VW_ICAS1.Chorus.All_Cores.SoftwareDecomposition.ComplexDeviceDrivers.ErrHdl_MQB.SW Architecture.Components It satisfies the following Design Decision Design Decision - Justification. This is a helper function used to Resets all DK2 Coding related DTC's incase of coding update.

briefdescription.para: This function sets (qualifies) DTC error code for LIN Global Timeout.

briefdescription.para: This function sets (qualifies) DTC error code for CAN Global Timeout / No Communication error.

briefdescription.para: This function is used as an wrapper for Dem_SetEventStatus DEM interface.

parameterdescription.para: uint8 Dem_SetEnableCondition - DEM enable condition ID.
boolean ConditionFulfilled - DEM enable condition state.

simplesect.para: Std_ReturnType RetVal - E_OK in case of success, otherwise E_NOT_OK.

simplesect.title: Test Method
simplesect.para: This function can be verified in following test: TEST_ErrDemSetEnableCondition

simplesect.title: Traceability
simplesect.para: This function is given by VW_ICAS1.Chorus.All_Cores.SoftwareDecomposition.ComplexDeviceDrivers.ErrHdl_MQB.SW Architecture.Components It satisfies the following Design Decision Design Decision - Justification. This is a helper function used to set the enable conditions on the DEM side.

parameterdescription.para: Dem_EventStatusType EventStatus - pointer to event status

simplesect.para: Std_ReturnType RetVal - E_OK in case of success, otherwise E_NOT_OK.

simplesect.title: Test Method
simplesect.para: This function can be verified in following test: TEST_ErrDemGetEventStatus

briefdescription.para: This function is used to change DEM operation cycle status.
